skills.name: Benevolence
skills.description: During your play phase, you can give any amount of hand cards to another player.  If the total number of cards given away is 2 or more, you regain 1 health.

skills.name: Rouse [Monarch Ability]
skills.description: You can ask any Shu characters to use a [Strike] for you.

skills.name: Relish [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever another player uses [Strike] on you, they must discard a basic card, or that [Strike] has no effect on you.

skills.name: Devolution
skills.description: You can skip your play phase. If you do so, you can discard a hand card at the end of your turn and let another player start an extra turn.

skills.name: Irony [Monarch Ability][Awakening Ability]
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, if your health the lowest or among the lowest, you must raise your health limit by 1, regain 1 health and permanently gain the ability [Rouse].

skills.name: Star Gaze
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, you can view X number of cards from the top of the deck (X equals to the number of players still in play with X having maximum of 5). Of these X cards, you can choose any number of cards to place on the top of the deck in any order and rest are to be placed at the bottom of the deck in any order.

skills.name: Desolate [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you have no hand cards, you cannot become the target of [Strike] or [Duel].

skills.name: Dragon Heart
skills.description: You can use hand cards [Strike] as [Dodge], and [Dodge] as [Strike].

skills.name: Paladin
skills.description: You can use any ♥ or ♦ suit cards as [Strike].

skills.name: Enlightenment
skills.description: Whenever you use a non delayed scroll card (before it activates), you can immediately draw 1 card.

skills.name: Prodigy
skills.description: Any scroll cards you use have no range limit.

skills.name: Horsemanship [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: You will always have -1 distance in any range calculations.

skills.name: Ironsteed
skills.description: Whenever you use [Strike] on another player, you can choose to make a Judgement. If the Judgement Result is a ♥ or ♦, the [Strike] cannot be evaded by a [Dodge].

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: During your play phase, you can use any number of [Strike].

skills.name: Formation [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you have no armour equipped, it will always appear as if you have [Eight Trigrams] equipped.

skills.name: Arson
skills.description: During your play phase, you can use any ♥ or ♦ suit hand cards as [Fire Attack].

skills.name: Decipher
skills.description: You can use any ♠ or ♣ hand cards as [Ward].

skills.name: Shackle
skills.description: You can use any ♣ hand cards as [Chain].

skills.name: Nirvana [Restricted Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you are on the brink of death, you can choose to discard all your cards and reset to unchained state. Then resurrect to 3 health and draw 3 cards.

skills.name: Fearsome Archer
skills.description:
During your play phase, you can make your [Strike] not evadable by [Dodge] under either of these circumstances: 
1. The number of hand cards of the target player is less than or equal to your attacking range. 
2. The number of hand cards of the target player is more than or equal to your health.

skills.name: Mad Bone [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you deal damage to any player within physical range of 1, you regain 1 health for every 1 damage dealt.

skills.name: Mastermind [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: [Barbarian Invasion] has no effect to you. You will be the source of any damage dealt by the use of [Barbarian Invasion].

skills.name: Rise Again
skills.description: During your drawing phase, if you are not at full health, you can choose to give up the drawing phase and instead, flip X number of cards from the deck (X being the amount of health you've currently lost). Of these X cards, you will gain 1 health for every ♥ suit card. The ♥ suit cards will be discarded while the remaining cards will be kept into your hand.

skills.name: Giant Elephant [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: [Barbarian Invasion] has no effect to you. Whenever another player uses [Barbarian Invasion] and the card's effects are concluded, you will acquire that card.

skills.name: Fiery Edge
skills.description: Whenever you use [Strike] to deal damage, you can choose to Compare Cards. If you win you take 1 card from the target.

skills.name: Grudges [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever another player cause you to regain 1 health, that player can draw 1 card. Whenever another player deal damage to you, they must give you a ♥ suit hand card or else that player takes 1 damage.

skills.name: Dazzlement
skills.description: During your play phase, you can give a ♥ suit hand card to another player, then you can take a card from that player and give to any other player besides that player. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Mind Game
skills.description: During your play phase, if your number of hand cards exceed your health limit, you can view the top 3 cards of the deck. Of these 3 cards, reveal any number of ♥ suit cards then keep them. For the remaining cards, place on the top of the deck in any order. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Weep [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: The player that kills you must discard all their cards immediately.

skills.name: Silence [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Non-delayed scroll cards you use have no effect when targeting other players, and non-delayed scroll cards other players use have no effect when targeting you.

skills.name: Nominate
skills.description: During your play phase, you can discard up to 3 cards then let another player draw the same number of cards. For this if you discard 3 cards of the same type, you regain 1 health. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: During your play phase, you can pick a player that is able to [Strike] you. That player must use a [Strike] on you, otherwise you discard 1 card from that player. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Ambition Continues
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, if you have no hand cards, you must either regain 1 health or draw 2 cards. Then reduce your health limit by 1 and permanetly gain the ability [Star Gaze].

skills.name: Marriage
skills.description: During your play phase, you can discard 2 hand cards and pick any injured male character. Then both the male character and yourself will regain 1 health each. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Warrior Lady
skills.description: Whenever you lose an item in the equipment field, you can draw 2 cards.
